title: Fix null pointer in UserProfileService.getAvatar()
author: mobile-dev
content:
Repository: gathertown/corporate-context
Pull Request: #205 - Fix null pointer in UserProfileService.getAvatar()
URL: https://github.com/gathertown/corporate-context/pull/205
Status: open
Author: mobile-dev

Description:
Handle case where user.avatarUrl is null instead of throwing NullPointerException.

Root cause:
The getAvatar() method was calling .toString() on avatarUrl without null check. Users without profile pictures have null avatarUrl.

Changes:
- Added null check before accessing avatarUrl
- Return default avatar placeholder when avatarUrl is null
- Added unit tests for null avatar case

Stack trace from crash reports:
```
java.lang.NullPointerException
  at UserProfileService.getAvatar(UserProfileService.java:142)
  at ProfileViewController.loadProfile(ProfileViewController.java:87)
```
